phrases: K- Kuririn, you handed it over pretty easily, considering, huh?
You had to work so hard to get that Dragon Ball, too.
He said that was the last Dragon Ball, so it is all over now.
If I had not handed it over, we definitely would have gotten killed.
The fact that the two of us are even alive like this...
Besides, we are probably still okay handing over that Dragon Ball.
I am sure that the Dragon Ball that Gohan went looking for...
from gathering all seven of them.
That is right!
Gohan- kun must have found that Dragon Ball already,
and now he is heading back!
That means things are not going the way Vegeta had hoped, are they?
Mm-hmm.
As long as Vegeta does not find Gohan, they are.
He is late, is he not?
Y- yes, sir!
It has been four hours.
What could Zarbon- san be doing?
Seeing as how he has not returned,
he has either fled,
or he has been killed.
If I had known this would happen,
I should have brought the Ginyu Special Corps from the start, huh?
Yes, sir!
C- concerning that,
according to a message we just received from Planet Freeza,
preparations for the Ginyu Special Corps' departure are complete.
Is that so?
I look forward to it.
Now then...
I have no need of cowardly men, like yourself.
Be gone.
Ginyu Special Corps, launch!
What exactly is happening on Planet Namek!?
W- what is this!?
There is an enormous power headed for Planet Namek.
Is it Goku?
There are five of them.
Is this...
The Ginyu Special Corps?
Mm-hmm.
They are the evil overlord Freeza's special private squad.
The Ginyu Special Corps have always operated
in the shadows of Freeza's rule over the universe.
I do not know about Ginyu, or whatever,
but we will put those guys down g-iny-ood and hard!
That was funny, that was funny!
Kaio- sama, how was that pun-?
Kaio- sama...
The Ginyu Special Corps - a fearsome squad of evil.
Each one of their powers might be higher than even Goku's.
And there are five of them.
For some reason, it feels like my body has suddenly become lighter.
All right, one more burst!
Something is coming from straight ahead!
It is a very strong Ki...
Vegeta!
All of a sudden, there is a strong battle power in front of me...
l have to mask my Ki...
The presence just disappeared.
Impossible...
I am sure it was around here.
Vegeta!
Hurry and get out of here!
Who is there!?
Come on out!
I know you are there!
If you do not show yourself at once,
I am going to blow this whole area away!
H - he would not!
What is the matter!?
Huh!?
All right, I wonder if I had better jump out and fight Vegeta.
But then...
Gohan, there is no way we can match up against Vegeta now.
l have to protect this precious Dragon Ball at this point.
You do not intend to come out, huh?
All right... as you wish, I will blow you away!
Rats!
W-
Wait!
Please, do not let him find this...
I- it is me!
Kakarrot's son, huh?
Kakarrot's son, huh?
I thought that perhaps it might be you.
There were other Earthlings here.
You being here is not all that surprising.
A Dragon Ball!
D- do not tell me that is!
This?
I got it as a present from that bald-headed friend of yours.
Y- you... killed Kuririn- san... did not you!?
If you would like me to,
I would not mind going back now and killing him for you.
Be grateful.
To celebrate me getting all of the Dragon Balls together, I let him live.
A- all of the Dragon Balls?
Hey, what is that you are holding in your hand?
T- this is a clock!
Heh, a clock?
With science that can only make a clock as huge as that one,
I am impressed that you could make it to this planet.
N- nobody asked you!
By the way, is that Kakarrot bastard here, too?
No, he is not!
We did not know there would be bad guys like you here!
Is that so?
That is too bad, huh?
The three of us...
When you get back to Earth, tell him something for me.
Tell him I said that I will come to Earth before long,
and this time, I will blow both you and the Earth away.
It is around time for you to be missing your mother's milk, is not it?
Hurry back to Earth, now.
That hurt!
But still...
Dammit!
Is not he back yet!?
Kuririn, I have taken down the house, and returned it to its Capsule.
Is not Gohan- kun back yet?
I- I do not see him yet.
I sure hope he was not discovered by Vegeta.
Vegeta has found out about this place.
We have to change locations, fast.
What is Gohan doing!?
Hurry!
Hurry!
Kuririn- san!
He is here!
Kuririn- san, I found this!
You did it!
We have been waiting for this!
Gohan- kun, way to go!
Gohan, I will fill you in on the details later,
but we have to hurry and get away from here,
or things are going to get dicey.
I know most of it already.
Vegeta found me, too.
But I managed to hide the Dragon Ball somehow,
so I got away without him finding it.
Y- you were lucky, too, huh?
Kuririn, Gohan- kun, let us just get moving.
-Right.
-Yeah.
This is the lake.
The Dragon Ball is submerged in here.
Once I pull it out...
Take that, Freeza!
As of right now, the universe belongs to me.
That is strange.
lt was definitely submerged in this area.
lt's gone!
lmpossible!
lt was him!
The place where I ran into that kid...
Why, that miserable brat!
But how did he search for the Dragon Ball?
This is a clock!
That was no clock!
lt was radar!
Damn it!
You Earthling punks!
Play me for a fool, will you!?
You will pay for this!
Damn it all!
Damn it all!
Damn it all!
Where are you, you punk kids!?
Come on out, or you will be sorry!
Dammit, they have disappeared, have they!?
Damn it all, I cannot sense their presence, either.
Those brats are able to control their presence all the way down to zero.
I cannot find them like this.
Those rotten Earthlings!
That was an insolent stunt to pull!
But they are sure to come after the six Dragon Balls that I have at some point.
And when they do...
It is okay.
He will not find us here.
Hold on a minute.
I cannot even set up the house in a place as tight as this, can I?
Please do not ask the impossible.
There are not too many caves like that last one, after all.
We just have to put up with it until Father arrives, Bulma- san.
Huh?
You mean, until Son- kun gets here, a lady such as myself
is going to have to stay here, in a place that does not even have a bathroom,
together with you guys?
Oh, you do not have to worry on that point.
I will be taking Gohan with me,
and we will be going to Grand Elder- sama's place again.
Huh?
How come?
What is this!?
You mean you are going to be leaving me here all by myself!?
Please bear with us.
Once Gohan meets Grand Elder- sama,
there is a chance that he will gain enough strength to rival even Vegeta.
Freeza's secret weapon, the Ginyu Special Corps,
had at last gone into action.
Goku was also headed for Planet Namek
while continuing to train under 100-times gravity.
Vegeta was seething with anger.
And Kuririn and Gohan had taken off to see the Grand Elder.
A grand three-way battle intertwining good and evil was about to begin.
